summary: Add a standalone follower inspired by Sol the Sun Goddess availabe for CBBE Vanilla, CBBE Curvy, and UNP body.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=3][size=3][size=6]Sol the Sun Goddess [/size][/size][size=3]
[/size]
Add a standalone follower inspired by Sol the Sun Goddess
availabe for CBBE Vanilla, CBBE Curvy, and UNP body.[size=3]
[/size][/size]
[size=3]Name : Sol
Race: Custom Nord
Body: CBBE Vanilla and UNP
Voiced: Female Young Eager

Essensial: False
Marrigable: True
Morality: Any Crime

Class: Mage Destruction
Stats: Levels 25 - 150
Extra: 1000 Health, Magika, and Stamina.
Combat Style: Mage

Outfit: -None-
Inventory: [size=3]-None-[/size]
Stats: Vanilla
Craftable: [size=3]Vanilla[/size]
Upgradeable: [size=3]Vanilla[/size]

Weapon: Shiv
Stats: Vanilla
Craftable: [size=3]Vanilla[/size]
Upgradeable: [size=3]Vanilla[/size]

[size=3][b][b]Location:
[/b][/b][size=3]Look for a trap door around Riverwood Mill[/size]

[b]Required :
[/b]Skyrim.esm[b]
[/b]Update.esm[b]
[/b]Dawnguard.esm[b]
[/b][b]
[/b][b][b]Installation : [/b]
[/b]NMM or copy to data folder[b]

[b]Uninstall : [/b]
[/b]Remove from NMM or Delete from data folder[b]
[size=3][size=3][b]
